thread.title: FH from Bucks
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by FH from Bucks

author: FH from Bucks
title: FH from Bucks
text: I've been looking for ages for a smart, warm, padded coat with no hood and this is perfect. Really comfortable, soft and warm lining and looks great. Really pleased with the coat and the fantastic service. Would definitely recommend Country Attire Ltd.
